game.name: Axolotl Swim
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Remote Play Together
game.shortDescription: Join John Axolotl in his quest to reach the end! Eat orange fishies to refill you dashes, and red hearts to refill your health. Collect treasure chests for points to spend on death. Spend your total score on funny clothing at the shop!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join John Axolotl in his quest to reach the end! Eat orange fishies to refill you dashes, and red hearts to refill your health. Collect treasure chests for points to spend on death. Spend your total score on funny clothing at the shop!
